name: Honkai: Star Rail - Celestial Eyes Above Mortal Ruins
storyline: The jade mirror hangs high in the sky, reflecting the remnants of calamity in the world. Even as the stars shift and turn, the shadows of the past disasters have not dissipated.
summary:
Version 1.3 of Honkai: Star Rail, which included:
• New characters: Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae, Fu Xuan and Lynx
• New main story quest: Obsequies Performed, A Long Road Ahead
• New area: Aurum Alley
• New companion missions for Dan Heng, Luka, March 7th and Lynx
• New main event: Aurum Alley's Hustle and Bustle
• New Simulated Universe mode: The Swarm Disaster
• New QoL changes: Trailblaze Power System Optimization and Phone Wallpaper
• …and more!
